description: Time to heat things up by a few notches? This is the electric version of the /b/Steam Blast Furnace/b/. The /b/Electric Blast Furnace/b/ uses induction heating to produce extreme temperatures, unlocking a plethora of new recipes. Plus, it's /6/overclock is bounded to 128 EU/t by default/6/, just like other multiblock electric machines.

The /b/Electronic Blast Furnace/b/ or /b/EBF/b/ is made out of purely /b/Heatproof Machine Casings/b/ and /b/Cupronickel Coils/b/. /6/Use your /b/Wrench/b/ to see the mutliblock's shape and block placement/6/. The controller is placed on the bottom layer and hatches and be placed on the top or bottom layer.

/6/ Don't forget to add an Energy Input Hatch(es)/6/ or the EBF won't have any energy to run! Start with a /b/LV Energy Input Hatch/b/ and you can upgrade to higher tier /b/Energy Input Hatches/b/ when you have the appropriate power tiers. Remember, the /b/LV Energy Input Hatch/b/ will only connect to /b/LV cables/b/.
You'll also need item or fluid input hatches and item or fluid output hatches based off of the use case of the /b/EBF/b/. Check your REI for it's new recipes and choose hatches based off your needs.
